name: partials/ic-main-content.html
content:
<section
	ng-repeat 		= "section in ic.site.config.sections"
	ng-show			= "ic.site.visibleSections[section.name]"
	
	
	id				= "section-{{section.name}}"
	class			= "bg-1"
	ng-include 		= "section.template" 
	ic-tab-group	= "section.tabgroup"
>
</section>

content:

	ng-click 	= "ic.site.expandMap = !ic.site.expandMap"
	ng-class 	= "{'icon-map-expand': !ic.site.expandMap, 'icon-map-reduce': ic.site.expandMap}"
	class		= "icon"	
	aria-label	= "{{'INTERFACE.EXPAND_MAP' | translate}}" 
	title		= "{{'INTERFACE.EXPAND_MAP' | translate}}" 
>
</button>

name: partials/ic-section-page.html
content:
<article
	ic-settle-scrollbar		= "true"
	ic-scroll-source 		= "page"
	class					= "padding"
>

	<ic-page
		ng-if					= "ic.site.visibleSections.page" 
		ng-include 				= "'pages/'+ic.site.page+'.html'"
		id						= "page-{{ic.site.page}}"	
		ic-scroll-top  			= "ic.site.page"
	></ic-page>

	<ic-footer></ic-footer>

</article>
